subject: Basketball
Halls of Fame
organizations: Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame
lead_paragraph: On a day of unconventional pairings, Isiah Thomas will present John Stockton for induction into the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame on Friday.
snippet: On a day of unconventional pairings, Isiah Thomas will present John Stockton for induction into the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame on Friday.
